publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1902 Mr Andrew Welsh: Reid Lichties Promotion—That the Parliament congratulates Arbroath Football Club on being promoted to the First Division of the Scottish Football League; recognises the considerable achievement of the players and manager John Brownlie, and wishes all concerned with Arbroath Football Club every success for the season to come. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-1902 Reid Lichties Promotion (lodged on 2 May 2001) Mr Alex Salmond*

S1M-1902 Mr Andrew Welsh: Reid Lichties Promotion—That the Parliament congratulates Arbroath Football Club on being promoted to the First Division of the Scottish Football League; recognises the considerable achievement of the players and manager John Brownlie, and wishes all concerned with Arbroath Football Club every success for the season to come. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Alex Salmond
S1M-1902 Reid Lichties Promotion (lodged on 2 May 2001) Ms Sandra White*
S1M-1902 Reid Lichties Promotion (lodged on 2 May 2001) Irene McGugan*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*
S1M-1902 Reid Lichties Promotion (lodged on 2 May 2001) Brian Adam*, Mr Gil Paterson*

S1M-1902 Mr Andrew Welsh: Reid Lichties Promotion—That the Parliament congratulates Arbroath Football Club on being promoted to the First Division of the Scottish Football League; recognises the considerable achievement of the players and manager John Brownlie, and wishes all concerned with Arbroath Football Club every success for the season to come. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Alex Salmond, Ms Sandra White, Irene McGugan, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Brian Adam, Mr Gil Paterson, Alex Neil*
S1M-1902 Reid Lichties Promotion (lodged on 2 May 2001) Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-1902 Reid Lichties Promotion (lodged on 2 May 2001) Andrew Wilson*
S1M-1902 Reid Lichties Promotion (lodged on 2 May 2001) Kay Ullrich*

S1M-1902 Mr Andrew Welsh: Reid Lichties Promotion—That the Parliament congratulates Arbroath Football Club on being promoted to the First Division of the Scottish Football League; recognises the considerable achievement of the players and manager John Brownlie, and wishes all concerned with Arbroath Football Club every success for the season to come. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson, Mr Alex Salmond, Ms Sandra White, Irene McGugan, Mr Brian Monteith, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Brian Adam, Mr Gil Paterson, Alex Neil, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Adam Ingram, Andrew Wilson, Kay Ullrich

S1M-1902 Mr Andrew Welsh: Reid Lichties Promotion—That the Parliament congratulates Arbroath Football Club on being promoted to the First Division of the Scottish Football League; recognises the considerable achievement of the players and manager John Brownlie, and wishes all concerned with Arbroath Football Club every success for the season to come.
